title: Amelia Cole and the Hidden War
description: Magic do-gooder (or troublemaker, depending on who you ask) Amelia Cole is back, and this time, she's The Protector! What is The Hidden War? Who are Omega Company? And is the Protector cloak as itchy as it looks? The mysterious "Unknown World" becomes increasingly dangerous as Adam P. Knave & D.J. Kirkbride write, Nick Brokenshire illustrates, Rachel Deering letters, and Ruiz Moreno color assists Amelia Cole and The Hidden War from IDW Publishing and Monkeybrain Comics!
author: Adam P. Knave
